tag_list: communications, oracle, sharency, founder, social-media, consulting, strategy, advisor, investor, architect, engineer
overview:
My Moto: Luck runs out. Competency doesn’t. Â©

IT Professional with over 15 years of experience, mainly in the field of the Telecommunications Industry, with a particular focus on Mobile Operators, Value Added Services and Social Networks. Co-Founder of Sharency Ltd. a company that specialized on Social Media viral Marketing and Advertising, & Co-Founder of Mobartia Ltd., a company that specialized on mobile and internet platform design, architecture, development and deployment of outstanding quality solutions.

Antonios, currently Director, Communications & Media Industry Solutions Group in EMEA, joined Oracle Corporation in 2002 and is currently responsible for delivering specific Communications Industry solution(s) expertise within the EMEA (Europe, Middle East & Africa) territory, to maximize long term revenue attainment for the company. Prior to Oracle, Antonios provided Information Technology & Supply Chain expertise at Ford Motor Company in the United Kingdom.

Antonios achieved his PhD at the University of Aegean, Greece, and his MSc and BEng were both completed at University of Surrey, UK. He has published a substantial amount of papers in A-list Scientific Journals in the field of Operations Research.
